page.title: 09 Town Centre
page.content: Shopping is centred on one main road with side streets south of the railway bridge.There are two main supermarkets,Gateway and International.There are several shops selling the same type of goods;eg Butchers,Bakers and Greengrocers.The public can choose from a variety of banks eg Barclays,Lloyds,Natwest and TSB and Building societies eg Abbey National,Nationwide,Bradford and Bingley and Halifax.There are several car parks but you only pay in one of them. The market is held just behind the town centre being open Monday,Friday and Saturday,with second hand and auction on Tuesday.There are several Take-away shops both English and Oriental. ETAERC03480612
